resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106744</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106744</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206991</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Water Sources in Cape Verde and West Africa</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wasser-Quellen in Kap-Verde und in Westafrika</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sources d'eau au Cap Vert et en Afrique 
occidentale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Fontes de água em Cabo Verde e em África 
ocidental</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Fonti d'acqua nel Capo Verde ed in Africa ad 
ovest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πηγές ύδατος στο Ακρωτήριο Βέρντε και τη δυτική 
Αφρική</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuentes de agua en Cabo Verde y África del oeste</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">allows students to research five methods of obtaining and/or conserving water, create displays, and give oral presentations of what they have learned to the diverse members of a simulated Cape Verdean community.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlaubt Kursteilnehmern, fünf Methoden des 
Erhaltens und/oder des Konservierens des Wassers zu erforschen, 
Bildschirmanzeigen zu erstellen und gibt Munddarstellungen von, was 
sie zu den verschiedenen Bauteilen einer simulierten Kap Verdean 
Gemeinschaft erlernt haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">permet à des étudiants de rechercher cinq 
méthodes d'obtenir et/ou d'économiser l'eau, créer des affichages, 
et donne des présentations orales de ce qu'ils ont appris aux membres
divers d'une communauté simulée de Verdean de cap.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">permite que os estudantes pesquisem cinco métodos
de obter e/ou de conservar a água, para criar indicadores, e dão 
apresentações orais de o que aprenderam aos membros diversos de uma 
comunidade simulada de Verdean do cape.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">permette che gli allievi ricerchino cinque metodi 
di ottenere e/o di conservazione dell'acqua, creare le visualizzazioni
e che danno le presentazioni orali di che cosa hanno imparato ai 
membri vari di una Comunità simulata di Verdean del cape.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">επιτρέπει στους σπουδαστές στην έρευνα πέντε μέθοδοι 
ή/και το ύδωρ, δημιουργεί τις παρουσιάσεις, και κάνει τις 
προφορικές παρουσιάσεις αυτού που έχουν μάθει στα διαφορετικά 
μέλη μιας μιμούμενης από το Πράσινο Ακρωτήρι κοινότητας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">permite que los estudiantes investiguen cinco 
métodos de obtener y/o de conservar el agua, crear visualizaciones, y
da presentaciones orales de lo que han aprendido a los miembros 
diversos de una comunidad simulada de Verdean del cabo.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206991</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106744</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/water-sources-in-cape-verde-and-west-africa</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
